about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable adventure in the hidden object game "Twin Mind: Nobody's Here DLC"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the extra locations!
This downloadable content contains four new locations! In the main game, investigate the criminal’s test place, visit a secret aisle on a construction site and find important clues in the lower deck of a yacht! In the bonus game, explore Ralph's hidden office!

In the new locations, you can learn new details about the characters and uncover all the secrets of the mysterious murders of the scientists. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

🕵️ FIND OUT MORE ABOUT THE EVIL EXPERIMENTS!
Explore a room where all the horrible experiments were made and find helpful clues on how to catch the criminal!

🕵️ VISIT THE SECRET AISLE!
Strange machines have been taken out of here, and at night people hear someone crying. Investigate the place and find out what's going on!

🕵️ FIND CLUES ON A YACHT!
Solve the puzzles and go through the mini-games to collect all the hidden items in the lower deck of a yacht!

🕵️ EXPLORE THE PERSONAL OFFICE!
In the additional location bonus game you have to explore Ralph's personal office and find out what secrets are kept there!

Are you ready to solve all the mysteries of the strange criminal case? Begin your investigation and unlock all the achievements!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
